column2: "EINFÜHRUNG: As a preferred supplier for Roche Diagnostics Int Ltd in Rotkreuz, we are looking for an individual as Data Scientist and Business Intelligence Specialist (m/f/d)Contract for one year, with possible extension. The earliest start date is asap or within 3 months. Home Office will be possible by agreement, 1-3 times per week.AUFGABENBESCHREIBUNG: Tasks & Responsibilities:• Collect, analyze, and interpret large datasets using tools such as Excel, SQL, and Python Develop and maintain dashboards and reports that summarize data in a clear and concise manner• Collaborate with stakeholders across the company to identify key business questions and translate them into data-driven insights• Identify trends and patterns in data and develop hypotheses to explain them• Provide guidance and training to team members on data analytics and BI toolsvMonitor key performance indicators and alert stakeholders to changes or trends that require attention• Develop and maintain documentation for data analysis processes and methodologies• Design and develop business intelligence solutions using tools such as Tableau• Extract, transform, and load data from various sources into a data warehouse or data mart• Design and develop data models and data cubes to support reporting and analysis• Work with stakeholders to understand their reporting and analysis needs and develop solutions that meet those needs• Develop and maintain documentation for business intelligence solutions and processes ERFORDERLICHES PROFIL: Must Haves:• Min. Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field such as statistics, mathematics, computer science, or engineering (***)• Min. 3-5 years of experience in a Data Analyst or Data Scientist role (*****)• Strong proficiency in SQL, Excel, and at least one scripting language such as Python or R (*****)• Hands- on experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or QlikView (*****)• Fluency in German and English (min. B2) (**)• Demonstrated ability to work on multiple projects with competing priorities and deadlines.• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills• Ability to adapt to a changing environment• Excellent communication and collaboration skills• Ability to work independently and as part of a teamNice to Have:• Knowledge of cloud-based data warehousing and analytics platforms such as AWS Redshift or Google BigQuery• Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and project management tools \nApplication processInterested? You can find more information here: Infopackage. Please apply via the \"Bewerben\" button below and answer all questions, otherwise we will be unable to process your application. Please upload your CV in English or German along with your degree certificate and latest reference letter.\n"
